definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions

sentences.english: The foam concrete block was prepared by self-made compound protein foam agent.
sentences.chinese: 以自制复合型蛋白质为发泡剂，制备泡沫混凝土砌块。

sentences.english: The sponge in the cushion and the backrest are both manufactured by employing freeze foaming and forming techniques.
sentences.chinese: 座垫和靠背海绵均采用冷固化发泡成型技术制造。

sentences.english: Insert it in the foam while it drys .
Curing property of the adhesive was studied by thermal analysis.
sentences.chinese: 通过热分析，研究了该发泡胶的固化特性。

sentences.english: And the writer's view is presented about the development of blowing agent.
sentences.chinese: 最后对发泡剂的发展提出了自己的见解。

sentences.english: The apparatus and the bubble solution are made in the laboratory of BUIST.
sentences.chinese: 氦气泡发生器，低速发生头和发泡液由我们自制。

sentences.english: Foaming formula of PE/waste-paper composite is studied.
sentences.chinese: 对聚乙烯和废纸复合材料发泡配方进行了研究。

sentences.english: I then texture the styrofoam with a couple of small rocks.
sentences.chinese: 然后我纹理与小岩夫妇的发泡胶。

sentences.english: This is particularly true with high-frequency spark testers that should not be used with foamed insulation.
sentences.chinese: 因此高频火花机不被应用于发泡绝缘是非常正确的。

sentences.english: Two components of the polyether polyurethane systems with water as blowing agent are prepared.
sentences.chinese: 制得了以水作发泡剂的聚醚型聚氨酯鞋底原液。

sentences.english: Thermal and mechanical properties of FP foamed adhesive were tested and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 对FP发泡胶进行了热分析和力学性能测试。

sentences.english: Sparkling wine undergo a second alcoholic fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 发泡葡萄酒需要二次发酵作用。

sentences.english: These results indicated that HX is an efficient inhibitor on mouse oocyt…
sentences.chinese: 结果显示，次黄嘌呤是一种有效的生发泡破裂抑制剂。

sentences.english: It may also directly extrude wood like balpo different shaped material, the effect is better than that of single screw extruder.
sentences.chinese: 也可直接挤出仿真木发泡异型材，效果比单螺杆更佳。

sentences.english: Introduced the rigid polyurethane foam plastics entire water foaming craft basic principle.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了硬质聚氨酯泡沫塑料全水发泡工艺的基本原理。

sentences.english: Use Styrofoam for added stability and support for your puppet stage.
sentences.chinese: 使用发泡胶增加了稳定性和你的傀儡阶段支持。

definition: to bubble/to foam/to blister/to sprout boils (on one's body)/sparkling (wine etc)
